vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.CashOut (0x8c7777c45481dba411450c228cb692ac3d550344.sol#21-28):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x8c7777c45481dba411450c228cb692ac3d550344.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0x8c7777c45481dba411450c228cb692ac3d550344.sol#24)
